noo I sorta think they are very much aware of the time....in the beginning =
of my box sessions I would be so excited I would sometimes be up late in th=
e night doing sessions..".I was asked at some point do you sleep" also they=
 would say we need to sleep etc...I have this on recording somewhere on a C=
D. I wouldn't say they said anything without me having prove...but then aga=
in I record everything lol..you never know :)

On=
 Mon, Dec 20, 2010 at 5:01 PM, Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...> wrote:


=
=C2=A0 








Just my two cents and input based=C2=A0on what I get from m=
y ancestral guides and guardians...
=C2=A0
The spiritual dimension and thos=
e who reside there=C2=A0do not=C2=A0perceive "time" as we do in=C2=A0the ty=
pical=C2=A0linear fashion. Remember the saying, "In the twinkling of an eye=
?"
=C2=A0
10,000 years here may only seem like a few precious moments over=
=C2=A0there, and vice versa. 
=C2=A0
They also remind me of the quantum fie=
ld, string theory, our=C2=A0holographic Universe (etc)=C2=A0and that ALL ti=
me is "ticking" (past, present=C2=A0& future) at the very same moment. It's=
 all happening=C2=A0RIGHT=C2=A0NOW in various levels, layers, alternative r=
ealities and spiritual/energetic dimensions.
=C2=A0
The end of the Earth ha=
s already happened (for them and us!) in many ways. Depending on who you're=
 speaking=C2=A0to, some even describe what it was like when=C2=A0the planet=
 Earth was destroyed, speaking as though it has/had already occured.=C2=A0T=
here would also be dimensions in which this event has already occured thous=
ands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days from now and 10,000 years into the=
 future and every other possible scenario. 
=C2=A0
So which one is the RIGH=
T one then? 
=C2=A0
Well, I think they all are. 
=C2=A0
Because "they" live=
 in a world of "source energy", light, consciousness and perfect=C2=A0infor=
mation fields...one that's=C2=A0so completely and totally different to our =
own experience here/now=C2=A0and are=C2=A0not limited by linear time and lo=
cal/non-local space=C2=A0or relativity like we are, it's likely very diffic=
ult for most of the beings we would speak to through the box to give us spe=
cific information regarding such an event or the exact time (or even "which=
 Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally speaking!). 
=C2=A0
In other wo=
rds, they don't experience any of this stuff (and especially=C2=A0"time") l=
ike we do. =C2=A0
=C2=A0
To end,=C2=A0for several years=C2=A0now I've been=
=C2=A0a devoted care-giver to the ancient quartz=C2=A0crystal skulls=C2=A0o=
f Mayan legend=C2=A0and much of the mythologies and folklore surrounding th=
ese objects is focused around 2012 and the impending=C2=A0Great Shift. I've=
 also=C2=A0studied South American culture (past and present), anthropology,=
=C2=A0folklore=C2=A0and tribal customs along with=C2=A0their indigenous wis=
dom systems in=C2=A0varying=C2=A0depth with the Kogi Indians, Quechua Curan=
deros and residents of the Amazon. 
=C2=A0
For many years I followed the wo=
rk of Terence McKenna=C2=A0rather closely and Terence is someone I consider=
 a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he rest in peace). He developed a =
time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, the Mayan Calendar, Great Pyramid=
s, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness=C2=A0and other mathematic syst=
ems=C2=A0that showed a sharp spike followed by a near-perfect "dip" before =
it went off the charts and moved into "nothingness" completely around Decem=
ber 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't think this is when the world would=
 end, necessarily. 
=C2=A0
(His "official" position is that he simply didn'=
t know what to make of it or expect. One theory is that his algorithms refl=
ected such a change during a time=C2=A0that humanity may have finally broke=
n the time/space barrier and uncovered the keys to time travel and 4th dime=
nsional plane-shifting, to name just one possible solution.). =C2=A0
=C2=A0=

I've also been fortunate enough to live in Swaziland, South Africa with th=
e Swazi, Zulu, Xhosa=C2=A0and San Bushmen tribes who (like most other cultu=
res throughout time and history)=C2=A0also have their own teachings and mys=
tery traditions surrounding
this and other events. 
=C2=A0
Given that the S=
an are the most ancient tribal peoples and humanities oldest ancestors stil=
l living in the world today and whose incredible healing knowledge, spiritu=
al wisdoms and mystical practices far exceed any I've ever heard of or pers=
onally witnessed anywhere else in the world and they don't seem to feel tha=
t life on this=C2=A0planet=C2=A0is going to end anytime soon, so I'm not go=
ing to panic just yet. 
=C2=A0
These amazing people have their ears pressed=
 up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythms of Mother Earth and told me f=
irsthand that before the end comes certain events will take place on a scal=
e the whole world will be instantly made aware of...events that could still=
 take several hundred or even thousands of years to unfold.
=C2=A0
All I kn=
ow for my own self, personally, is that I have no clue what's going to happ=
en...but it will be okay, no matter what takes place. There are worst thing=
s than dying, believe me...and part of what makes our work with the Ghost B=
ox and ITC in general so helpful and inspiring is that we can find a level =
of peace and comfort through our sessions and recordings we might actually =
need one day, whether soon or in some distant time - we're all going to end=
 up there eventually, no doubt about it! 
=C2=A0
FINAL NOTE: I don't have a=
ll the answers...I don't even have all the questions, and I know it. My gue=
ss is as good as any and I could be completely and totally WRONG about all =
of this (I'm open to that and=C2=A0I'm perfectly fine with it). Believe you=
 me, if the world ends when a lot of=C2=A0folks think it might I'll be just=
 as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll keep doing what I do now; realizin=
g that I don't know a damn thing, taking life as it comes to me day by prec=
ious=C2=A0day, treating it with respect and honoring=C2=A0my experience her=
e=C2=A0as the gift it is, loving others, being good to the people around me=
=C2=A0and enjoying my family and time spent here while I can. 
=C2=A0
And I=
 won't be afraid...not even for one second or when I'm looking up and seein=
g that big f***ing rock heading right towards us, hahaha. For all I know (o=
r anyone here for that matter), I could be blindsided by a Mac truck later =
this evening! 
=C2=A0
Many of the people worried over 2012 won't even be he=
re when 2012 arrives...now how's THAT for a mind-f**k!?!?
=C2=A0
;)
=C2=A0
=
-J
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

Remember last year when we both got the A=

k they can.

I'm pretty sure that they can't tell the future, so when they =
say stuff i think they are just messing with us to see what we do with the =
information. They might even be laughing at us !

-Steve

<DIV>=
Just my two cents and input based on what I get from my ancestral guid=
es and guardians...</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The spiritual dimension an=
d those who reside there do not perceive "time" as we do in =
the typical linear fashion. Remember the saying, <EM>"In the twinkling=
 of an eye?"</EM></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>10,000 years here may only s=
eem like a few precious moments over there, and vice versa. </DIV>
<DI=
V> </DIV>
<DIV>They also remind me of the quantum field, string theory=
, our holographic Universe (etc) and that <EM><U>ALL time is "tic=
king"</U></EM> (past, present & future) at the very same moment. I=
t's all happening RIGHT NOW in various levels, layers, alternativ=
e realities and spiritual/energetic dimensions.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DI=
V>The end of the Earth has already happened (for them and us!) in many ways=
. Depending on who you're speaking to, some even describe <EM>what it =
was like</EM> when the planet Earth was destroyed, speaking as though =
it has/had already occured. There would also be dimensions in which th=
is event has already occured thousands of years ago, 5 minutes ago, 3 days =
from now and 10,000 years into the future and every other possible scenario=
. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>So which one is the RIGHT one then? </DIV>
=
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Well, I think they all are. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>=

<DIV>Because "they" live in a world of "source energy", light, consciousne=
ss and perfect information fields...one that's so completely and =
totally different to our own experience here/now and are not limi=
ted by linear time and local/non-local space or relativity like we are=
, it's likely very difficult for most of the beings we would speak to throu=
gh the box to give us specific information regarding such an event or the e=
xact time (or even "which Earth" they are referencing, dimensionally speaki=
ng!). </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>In other words, they don't experience a=
ny of this stuff (and especially "time") like we do.  </DIV>
<DIV=
> </DIV>
<DIV>To end, for several years now I've been a=
 devoted care-giver to the ancient quartz crystal skulls of Mayan=
 legend and much of the mythologies and folklore surrounding these obj=
ects is focused around 2012 and the impending Great Shift. I've also&n=
bsp;studied South American culture (past and present), anthropology, f=
olklore and tribal customs along with their indigenous wisdom sys=
tems in varying depth with the Kogi Indians, Quechua Curanderos a=
nd residents of the Amazon. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For many years I =
followed the work of Terence McKenna rather closely and Terence is som=
eone I consider a man-genius far ahead of his time (may he rest in peace). =
He developed a time-mapping system based on the I-Ching, the Mayan Calendar=
, Great Pyramids, DMT-beings, fractals, plant consciousness and other =
mathematic systems that showed a sharp spike followed by a near-perfec=
t "dip" before it went off the charts and moved into "nothingness" complete=
ly around December 21st, 2012...and even Terence didn't think this is when =
the world would end, necessarily. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>(His "offic=
ial" position is that he simply didn't know what to make of it or expect. O=
ne theory is that his algorithms reflected such a change during a time&nbsp=
;that humanity may have finally broken the time/space barrier and uncovered=
 the keys to time travel and 4th dimensional plane-shifting, to name just o=
ne possible solution.).  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I've also been =
fortunate enough to live in Swaziland, South Africa with the Swazi, Zulu, X=
hosa and San Bushmen tribes who (like most other cultures throughout t=
ime and history) also have their own teachings and mystery traditions =
surrounding<BR>this and other events. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Given t=
hat the San are the most ancient tribal peoples and humanities oldest ances=
tors still living in the world today and whose incredible healing knowledge=
, spiritual wisdoms and mystical practices far exceed any I've ever heard o=
f or personally witnessed anywhere else in the world and they don't seem to=
 feel that life on this planet is going to end anytime soon, so I=
'm not going to panic just yet. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>These amazing=
 people have their ears pressed up very closely to the heartbeat and rhythm=
s of Mother Earth and told me firsthand that before the end comes certain e=
vents will take place on a scale the whole world will be instantly made awa=
re of...events that could still take several hundred or even thousands of y=
ears to unfold.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>All I know for my own self, pe=
rsonally, is that I have no clue what's going to happen...but it will be ok=
ay, no matter what takes place. There are worst things than dying, believe =
me...and part of what makes our work with the Ghost Box and ITC in general =
so helpful and inspiring is that we can find a level of peace and comfort t=
hrough our sessions and recordings we might actually need one day, whether =
soon or in some distant time - we're all going to end up there eventually, =
no doubt about it! </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><STRONG>FINAL NOTE:</STRON=
G> I don't have all the answers...I don't even have all the questions, and =
I know it. My guess is as good as any and I could be completely and totally=
 WRONG about all of this (I'm open to that and I'm perfectly fine with=
 it). Believe you me, if the world ends when a lot of folks think it m=
ight I'll be just as surprised as anyone. Until then I'll keep doing what I=
 do now; realizing that I don't know a damn thing, taking life as it comes =
to me day by precious day, treating it with respect and honoring =
my experience here as the gift it is, loving others, being good to the=
 people around me and enjoying my family and time spent here while I c=
an. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>And I won't be afraid...not even for one =
second or when I'm looking up and seeing that big f***ing rock heading righ=
t towards us, hahaha. For all I know (or anyone here for that matter), I co=
uld be blindsided by a Mac truck later this evening! </DIV>
<DIV> </DI=
V>
<DIV>Many of the people worried over 2012 won't even be here when 2012 a=
rrives...now how's THAT for a mind-f**k!?!?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>;)=
</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>-J</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
